property.name: description
property.value: This point marks the start of [[Dark Ruins]], where [[Clover]] falls down from the [[Ruins]]. If Clover waits here long enough without changing rooms, [[Toriel]] throws down a rope.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Flowey]] introduces [[Clover]] to battles and [[SAVE]]s in ''[[Undertale Yellow]]'' here.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] meets [[Dalv]] for the first time, while he monologues about meeting a friend.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] sees [[Dalv]] across a large chasm. He's again monologuing about his past.

property.name: description
property.value: These four pillars can tell the story of [[Axis]] killing [[Integrity]]. Each of these pillars displays its drawing on a certain Fun Value range.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] meets [[Dalv]] for the third time, he turns around and tells them to go away.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Dalv]]'s diary, only readable on a [[Neutral Route]] after killing him. It talks about a friend who helped Dalv cope with the past.

property.name: description
property.value: If [[Dalv]] is present, he breaks the planks of this door to let [[Clover]] pass. Otherwise, [[Flowey]] breaks them.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Dalv]]'s various projects. He wants to be a book writer for kids, but he kind of forgot what colors are things outside of [[Dark Ruins]].

property.name: description
property.value: A big corn painting that [[Penilla]] drew for [[Dalv]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Dalv]]'s gramophone. ''Organ Demo'' can be played here.

property.name: description
property.value: Crispy Scroll as an NPC on the [[Pacifist Route]]. He talks about visiting the [[Garbage Dump]] and recommends anime to [[Clover]].

property.name: description
property.value: Rorrim as an NPC on the [[Pacifist Route]]. He's happy that he no longer needs to hide, and hopes to journey throughout the [[ut:Underground|Underground]].

property.name: description
property.value: Dust Bunny is hiding here from [[Dalv]], and challenges [[Clover]] to a dust counting duel. They lose!

property.name: description
property.value: Flier as an NPC on the [[Pacifist Route]]. He's checking out a beach house outside of [[Dark Ruins]].

property.name: description
property.value: If spared through silence, Decibat can be found here sleeping. Do not disturb him! Zzz...

property.name: description
property.value: Penilla as an NPC on the [[Pacifist Route]] after sparing [[Dalv]]. She's happy about no longer having to hide.

property.name: description
property.value: Sweet Corn as an NPC on the [[Pacifist Route]] after sparing [[Dalv]]. She's considering opening a free hugs booth after leaving the [[Dark Ruins]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Dalv]]'s balloon, Pops, likes the darkness of a wardrobe. Please give him some personal space!

property.name: description
property.value: Broom used to be like [[Dalv]]'s best friend, before he got [[Clover]] as an actual friend. Implied to have a partner in the [[Steamworks]].

property.name: description
property.value: Crack in the shape of "5" here, required for entering the [[Dark Ruins#Secret Room|secret room]] and battling [[Micro Froggit]]. This crack should be interacted with last!

property.name: description
property.value: Crack in the shape of "4" here, required for entering the [[Dark Ruins#Secret Room|secret room]] and battling [[Micro Froggit]].

property.name: description
property.value: Crack in the shape of "3" here, required for entering the [[Dark Ruins#Secret Room|secret room]] and battling [[Micro Froggit]].

property.name: description
property.value: Crack in the shape of "2" here, required for entering the [[Dark Ruins#Secret Room|secret room]] and battling [[Micro Froggit]].

property.name: description
property.value: Crack in the shape of "1" here, required for entering the [[Dark Ruins#Secret Room|secret room]] and battling [[Micro Froggit]]. This crack should be interacted with first!

property.name: description
property.value: First puzzle in the game. Switches should be used in order: right, left, middle.

property.name: description
property.value: First glowing boxes puzzle. Flipping the middle box, then the one to the left of it, is the optimal solution.

property.name: description
property.value: This corn maze is full of dead ends! The optimal path through it is marked on the map.

property.name: description
property.value: These spikes retract after hitting the switch to the east.

property.name: description
property.value: These spikes retract after hitting the switch at the maze's exit, making way to the room with [[Pebble Ammo]].

property.name: description
property.value: Glowing Boxes Puzzle the Second. Optimal solution is to flip the second box in the bottom row, then third box in the bottom row, and finally fourth box in the top row.

property.name: description
property.value: These rocks block the way to [[Micro Froggit]] and the [[Golden Pear]]. To pass through, hit the cracks in the shape of numbers in ascending order. Filter this map by "Cracks" to see their locations!

property.name: description
property.value: Tells [[Clover]] to use X to run, or, if auto-sprint is turned on in [[Game Config]], to use X to walk.

property.name: description
property.value: Hints how to reset the puzzle.

property.name: description
property.value: Hints how to solve the glowing boxes puzzle.

properties.property: Friend: I planted these for you. It isn't much but I hope it brightens your day. It always brightened mine.

property.name: description
property.value: "Friend: Do not fear the unknown. Sometimes they're nice."

property.name: description
property.value: "I seem to recall what I once saw so often..."

property.name: description
property.value: "What I remembered... It seems is now forgotten..."

properties.property: Property of Dalv (That monster in the cloak.) NO TRESPASSING!

property.name: description
property.value: Missing Poster can be seen falling down the chasm here.

property.name: description
property.value: Lemonade can be found here, with or without leaving a tip.

property.name: description
property.value: Candy Corn, a rejected piece of corn, can be found here.

property.name: description
property.value: Stray Feather can be found here.

property.name: description
property.value: First of the golden items, the Golden Pear, is found here.

property.name: description
property.value: The Corn Dog lies in a box of special corn.

property.name: description
property.value: If [[Dalv]] is present, he gives [[Clover]] some leftovers from his birthday Sponge Cake.

property.name: description
property.value: The secret enemy, Micro Froggit, is fought here.

object.name: Path over the bridge to Dalv
